short_summary: J7 Signals Intelligence (SIGINT) and Cyber Operations Training Team requires a Senior Business Architect and an Intermediate Courseware Developer.
description: J7 Signals Intelligence (SIGINT) and Cyber Operations Training Team within the Canadian Forces Information Operations Group (CFIOG) has a requirement for one Senior Business Architect and one Intermediate Courseware Developer to assist in developing and conducting the Military SIGINT Managers (MSM) course, the Cyber Domain Basics (CDB) course, the Indoctrination to Cyber Operations (ICO) course, and cyber operations exercise scenarios, as well as assistance in the development of SIGINT and Cyberspace Operations doctrine and policy.
full_summary:
# Senior Business Architect and Intermediate Courseware Developer
------------------------

### Title
Senior Business Architect and Intermediate Courseware Developer (French: Architecte des activités de niveau 3 et développeur de didacticiel de niveau 2)

### Reference Number
PW-22-01003900

### Solicitation Number
W6369-22-P5OE/A

### Publication Date
August 15, 2022

### Tender Closing Date
August 31, 2022, 14:00:00 (EST)

### Procurement Category
Services, Procurement Category Code: SRV

### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Regions of Opportunity
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### End-User Entities
Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Point of Contact
Mark Burke, Defense Dialogue and Assistance Group, 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada, (613-447-9379, Mark.Burke@forces.gc.ca)

### Notice
The Department of National Defence's J7 Signals Intelligence (SIGINT) and Cyber Operations Training Team requires the services of a Senior Business Architect and an Intermediate Courseware Developer to assist in the development and delivery of training programs for the military SIGINT managers, Cyber Domain Basics, Indoctrination to Cyber Operations, and cyber operations exercise scenarios. The contractor will also assist in the development of SIGINT and cyberspace operations doctrine and policy. The successful candidate will possess experience in developing and delivering training programs and experience working with military personnel in a training
